meta_title: How to Detect Bearing Failure Early: The P-F Interval Guide
meta_description: Detect bearing failure early using ultrasound and high-frequency vibration analysis to identify subsurface fatigue weeks before heat or audible noise occurs.
title: How to Detect Bearing Failure Early: A Reliability Engineer’s Guide to the P-F Interval
keyword: how to detect bearing failure early

hero_image.alt: Hero image for How to Detect Bearing Failure Early: A Reliability Engineer’s Guide to the P-F Interval

image_prompt: A high-detail close-up of a maintenance engineer using a handheld ultrasonic leak and friction detector on a large industrial motor housing. The engineer is wearing clean PPE and professional workwear. In the background, a tablet screen shows a clear FFT vibration spectrum with a highlighted peak. The setting is a modern, well-lit manufacturing facility with stainless steel machinery. Photo-realistic, 8k resolution, industrial aesthetic.
